replies.body:
WHY DO I EVEN HAVE TO EXPLAIN TO YOU WHY A SKILL-SHOT DESIGNED TO SHOOT OUT ONE PROJECTILE THAT INSTEAD SHOOTS OUT TWO IS A BUG?
{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

It only shoots one... it can just be cast twice.  How is that 'shoot out two instead'?  You understand the difference right?  Casting twice to get two projectiles != shoots once to get two projectiles.  It just sounds like you don't have an arguement that you're 'frustrated' it seems (all caps) to ' have to explain'.  It's just an interaction.

I was playing Olaf for the first time and I was right clicking everything just fine, then all of a sudden, I could only right click to move. I could not right click on any enemies, even in the jungle.  I could still use Q, sprint spell, W, and ultimate but I could not hit anything with basic attacks anymore.  Is this a bug or did I hit a different keybind that somehow stops you from right clicking enemies?  Please help. All four of my teammates said nothing despite me being unable to assist them with anything other than Q throws and absorbing Ahri stun.I even tried dying to a jungle monster to see if that would reset my ability to right click enemies, but it didn't work and I had to find a second jungle monster because my Vi decided to come along and kill said first monster without so much as an "i'm sorry Idk how to help you" reply. 

 I am sorry if this forum doesnt like necroposting but this was the first result on Google for Olaf right click bug, so here I am. Thank you in advance for any solutions you come up with for me.
Is it a bug?  It just seems like it's a cooldown and refund interaction.  I don't know if there is anything saying the person who visually wields two axes cannot throw those two axes in anyway.

"The axe Ghost ghosts neutral monsters hit, and remains at the target location until Undertow goes off Cooldown reduction icon cooldown" is what it says in  the lol wiki

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Olaf

this means the axe should disappear when it goes off cooldown, which makes it so he can only have one axe out at a time. its an exploit. It wasnt meant to work like this.

yes its a technically "bug", although "exploit" would be a more precise term.

as both axes allow him to reset the cooldown. even when that shouldn't be possible

and they both deal damage as well..

i mean imagine if nidalee threw out two spears at once?...

I mean... what if she did?  How is it a bug if the CDR is long enough?  Where is it said that Olaf can only throw one axe?  It's an axe.  It sits out for a set amount of time.  There's a cooldown and refund.  It's entirely possible with enough CDR to have 2 out.  He wields two axes as well.  How is throwing one of them mean only can throw one or that it shouldn't be possible to throw 2?  7 second cooldown.  Refunds more than half the CD by picking up.  Not sure how that doesn't scream can use 2 at once with skill.
